code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import api from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function CoursesPage(){const[courses,setCourses]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const fetchCourses=async()=>{try{const res=await api.get('/courses');setCourses(res.data);}catch(err){console.error("Failed to fetch courses");}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchCourses();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-[#E3DAD0] p-6",dir:"rtl",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-3xl font-black text-[#1A365D] mb-8 border-r-8 border-[#1A365D] pr-4",children:"\u0627\u0644\u062F\u0648\u0631\u0627\u062A \u0627\u0644\u0645\u062A\u0627\u062D\u0629"}),loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center font-bold text-[#1A365D]",children:"\u062C\u0627\u0631\u064A \u0627\u0644\u062A\u062D\u0645\u064A\u0644..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid gap-6",children:courses.map(course=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white p-6 rounded-[2.5rem] shadow-xl border border-white/50",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-black text-[#1A365D]",children:course.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-400 font-bold mb-4",children:course.instructor}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-between items-center mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-[#1A365D] font-black",children:course.price||"مجانية"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-[#1A365D] text-white px-6 py-2 rounded-xl font-bold",children:"\u062A\u0633\u062C\u064A\u0644 \u0627\u0644\u0622\u0646"})]})]},course._id))})]});}
